data: Refer to Decision Support Tool: Urinary Retention
Indications:  Not able to void for 4-6 hours (since last void) and bladder volume is greater than 400 mL with bladder scanner
Special Considerations:  Prescriber's orders required for use of an indwelling (Foley) catheter
Notify treating provider NIA OB Postpartum Urinary Retention has been initated and for possible indwelling catheter
